metadata.name: Smell The Light
metadata.description:
With your eyes, wakes up your soul and consciousness, as you gather everything about your surrounding, prepare to make the best of the day, take a pause and smell the light.

In every breath, smell of gratitude,
In every action, smell of kindness,
In every effort, smell of affirmations.
In every achievement, smell of joy.

The beauty of nature is to gift you with signs and hints that you can turn into miracles.

So today, I ask you, what are you affirming today?
What is the miracle you wish to see today?

Answer this to yourself and bring it to life.
Everything else is a myth.

Your truth is rare.
Your life is precious.
Your beliefs matter.

Here's to smelling the light, creating our own divine and spreading the brightest energy back into the Universe.



Dimensions: 3456 × 4608
Location: Srinagar, India
